title: I question about Assault and Battery.
body:
I was thinking. Whilst Vi is being CCed can she use her ult? 
In a specific situation:
A Lee Sin kicks her, whilst she's being knocked back can she at any point within the CC use Assault and Battery (Vi Ult) back to him?

replies.body:
she is only immune to cc while she ults
she has to make the animation to be immune to cc
no she can't be ccd during her ult but if you cc before her ult she has to wait till the cc ends

this is true i think, haven't checked it out, but also many things counter her ult, fizz's E, elise spider form E (i think), any silences or stuns stop her as she is moving to them, her ult is amazing but can be countered if you know how to play, also vi is broken fix that shit.

>While charging, Vi is immune to crowd control

That's off the wiki

>any silences or stuns stop her as she is moving to them

*facepalm*

You can't stop her moving, things that become untargetable remove the target she was to have and do work to stop the ult, but most times that just refreshes the timer.
dude i played vi for quite awhile and I'm pretty sure it doesn't reset the timer, but then again i hvaent played her in months so your probs right
It's iffy, and always has been, sometimes it resets it, sometimes it doesn't.
yeah i was going to say, cause i remember hating fizz cause he made my ult useless and i couldn't use it again for ages..
As soon as it ends yes, not during, it doesn't actually cancel the CC, it just isn't stopped during CC
